ygData.subject: Re: Boredom
ygData.msgSnippet: Roop and everyone else who feels this way: I have a suggestion that may not solve anything but might be fun to try. Why don t a bunch of you who are bored,
ygData.messageBody:
Roop and everyone else who feels this way:
I have a suggestion that may not solve anything but might be fun to try. Why
don't a bunch of you who are bored, tired of dweebs, camping, etc pick a
server together and start characters? I can tell many of you get along very
well, and I know it would be a pain to start a new character, but you know
what? It might be tons of fun and if you are bored to tears now, it can't
hurt huh?
A huge battalion of bards ;)

Just a thought,
Infiniti
